subNodes.conversationText: root
Yes <FirstName>, is there something you need?
I would like to know more about yourself.
What would you like to know?
Why are you risking your life to help me?
We've been friends since our youth, of course I will help you.
Continue
You would do the same for me, if my sister was missing.
I would, thank you, Randel.
Plus, the girls were friends of mine too.
I know, Randel.
Their abductors will pay if they cause any harm to the girls.
They will be saved.
Is there anything else you would like to know?
Yes.
What would you like to know?
Not right now.
Why didn't you follow Verto's order?
Verto has been acting suspicious as of late.
Continue
I don't know why he hasn't done more to find those missing.
Continue
I think he has taken fancy to Tindra.  I've seen her a few times at the barracks.
Continue
I wonder if that has anything to do with it.
infatuation can change a man.
I guess, but I think there is more to it.
I guess it is a coincidence that Tindra escaped capture.
I'm not so sure.
Continue
Is there anything else you would like to know?
Yes.
What would you like to know?
Not right now.
What do you know about Zorn?
As you know, he's the eldest son of Valdur the Just.  He wanted to be king of Charn after his father's death.
Continue
For this he was banished.  Later, he returned, in secrecy, and robbed The Living Tree of its power.
Continue
They say that Zorn has become immortal after stealing The Tree's power.
I guess I 've heard all of the same things you have.
Is there anything else you would like to know?
Yes.
What would you like to know?
Not right now.
Nothing right now.
Nothing for now.
